Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky brown with two added white bands; exterior, slip partly worn; painted decoration consisting of sphinx seated to left (trace of wing, back with added red blob and trace of thigh remaining).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1124) (phase 2)
